quote.content:
Part 2 The DC ERIC Plot Thickens With A Cup Of Elon & A Measure Of Soros
*after you click in this article it will take you to the Part 1 post (if youâ€™re not already there). This Part 2 post also appears in those comments. (this is why we want â€˜threadsâ€™ on gab)

From Part 1, Alabama Secretary of State Wes Allen discovered the ERIC home office in DC has been ğŸ§¹ cleaned out. He discovered this information by showing up there. The Electronic Registration Information Center Inc is contracted with now, 31, states. Read the ğŸ‘‡ğŸ¼ Jim Hoft article.

MUST READ article by Jim Hoft for yournews dot com, 4/22 but â° timely:
â€˜The ERIC database is comprehensive and would be one of the most coveted by bad actors looking to influence an election...â€ adding this â€œERIC is essentially a left wing voter registration drive disguised as voter roll clean upâ€. Hoft backs his statements, and more, here ğŸ‘‰ğŸ¼ https://yournews.com/2022/01/21/2285284/whos-cleaning-our-voter-rolls-soros-founded-and-funded-eric/

These links provide additional resources mentioned in the ğŸ‘†ğŸ¼ article but not linked:
The Pew Center On The States, which in-part, funds the ERIC organization ğŸ‘‰ğŸ¼https://www.pewtrusts.org/en/research-and-analysis/video/2012/pew-center-on-the-states-about-us
ERIC is also funded by George Soros Open Society ğŸ‘‰ğŸ¼https://www.opensocietyfoundations.org/george-soros
David Beckerâ€™s profile, a key player (Zuckerberg, CEIR), is linked in the Hoft article. ğŸ‘‰ğŸ¼ https://docs.house.gov/meetings/SY/SY00/20160913/105274/HHRG-114-SY00-Bio-BeckerD-20160913.pdf

Why is this important? As Hoft points out, this combo of data IS breathtaking. Hoft did not go far enough to include Musk & SorosğŸ‘‡ğŸ¼.
Elon Universityâ€™s â€˜Imagining the Internet Centerâ€˜ worked closely with ERICâ€™s support structure, ğŸ‘‰ğŸ¼ Pew Center On The States, in June of â€˜21 for the 12th â€˜Future of the Internetâ€˜ project. The canvassing project was to gauge how experts feel about the amount of control, or even influence, people will have in the coming tech age.
602 people responded after invitations were emailed to more than 10,000 experts and the â€˜interestedâ€˜ public. Turns out, they are split on how they see it unfolding. Many are placed directly along the path ofğŸ“tech progress.
Check out where the 602 respondents have, and do currently, work. Elon University is no wall flower. So many schools. So many NGOs running the world.
Here are the stunningly DETAILED canvassing reports from Pew ğŸ‘‰ğŸ¼https://www.pewresearch.org/internet/2021/06/16/ethical-ai-design-about-this-canvassing-of-experts/

ğŸš¨ Here is what the 32 member states signed up for with ERIC ğŸ‘‰ğŸ¼
https://ericstates.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/ERIC_Bylaws_and_Membership_Agreement_June_2022_FINAL_FOR_PUBLICATION.pdf

PHOTO 2ğŸ‘‡ğŸ¼The ERIC member states map with some stats.
Where did ERIC go? Why did it go?

_source.content: CONGRESSMAN Eric "Gang Bang on da Fang Fang" Swalwell has refused to say if he had sex with an alleged Chinese spy â€” claiming the information is "classified".He was one of a number of Democrats targeted in a honey trap operation to infiltrate political circles, according to bombshell reports last night.Overseas student Christine Fang â€” known as Fang Fang â€” is said to have been taped by the FBI having sex with two Midwestern mayors.She also cozied up to a string of other politicians including presidential hopeful Tulsi Gabbard before mysteriously vanishing.Swalwell, who is now a member of the House Intelligence Committee, is the most high profile figure to be swept up in the alleged scandal.Last night Fox News anchor Tucker Carlson claimed security agencies believe he was in a sexual relationship with the suspected spy.And Donald Trump Jr told the show it meant Swalwell was a "threat to national security."Carlson told viewers: "US intelligence officials believe that Fang had a sexual relationship with Eric Swalwell."We asked Swalwell's office about that directly today."His staff replied by saying that they could not comment whether Swalwell had a sexual relationship with Fang, because that information might be, quote, classified."Swalwell, 40, was unmarried at the time he met Fang in around 2012. He would wed Brittany Watts in 2016.She is said to have raise funds and campaigned for him among Asian American voters as head of a student group.According to a report by Axios, he cut off contact with Fang after a "defensive briefing" from FBI agents who were investigating her.Swalwell's office told The Sun: "Rep Swalwell, long ago, provided information about this person â€” whom he met more than eight years ago, and whom he hasnâ€™t seen in nearly six years â€” to the FBI."To protect information that might be classified, he will not participate in your story."There is a Reason this F##ktard is kicked Off of the Intelligence Committee.Same goes for Adam Schiff for Brains (D-CA)
_source.contentraw:
CONGRESSMAN Eric "Gang Bang on da Fang Fang" Swalwell has refused to say if he had sex with an alleged Chinese spy â€” claiming the information is "classified".

He was one of a number of Democrats targeted in a honey trap operation to infiltrate political circles, according to bombshell reports last night.

Overseas student Christine Fang â€” known as Fang Fang â€” is said to have been taped by the FBI having sex with two Midwestern mayors.

She also cozied up to a string of other politicians including presidential hopeful Tulsi Gabbard before mysteriously vanishing.

Swalwell, who is now a member of the House Intelligence Committee, is the most high profile figure to be swept up in the alleged scandal.

Last night Fox News anchor Tucker Carlson claimed security agencies believe he was in a sexual relationship with the suspected spy.

And Donald Trump Jr told the show it meant Swalwell was a "threat to national security."

Carlson told viewers: "US intelligence officials believe that Fang had a sexual relationship with Eric Swalwell.

"We asked Swalwell's office about that directly today.

"His staff replied by saying that they could not comment whether Swalwell had a sexual relationship with Fang, because that information might be, quote, classified."

Swalwell, 40, was unmarried at the time he met Fang in around 2012. He would wed Brittany Watts in 2016.

She is said to have raise funds and campaigned for him among Asian American voters as head of a student group.

According to a report by Axios, he cut off contact with Fang after a "defensive briefing" from FBI agents who were investigating her.

Swalwell's office told The Sun: "Rep Swalwell, long ago, provided information about this person â€” whom he met more than eight years ago, and whom he hasnâ€™t seen in nearly six years â€” to the FBI.

"To protect information that might be classified, he will not participate in your story."

There is a Reason this F##ktard is kicked Off of the Intelligence Committee.

Same goes for Adam Schiff for Brains (D-CA)

_source.content: "Most in the world, most on this planetary sphere, are in a position of resisting growth. There are very few who are welcoming it. And there is a great need for those who can do this and can share this experience with others. You are those.You are the group, you are members of the group that exists throughout the globe at this time, the Light Workers. And because you are more sensitive, you are experiencing these energies and these changes a bit ahead of others who are not quite so sensitive.This will benefit you in the long run. You are coming into the clear, so to speak. Your changes will not be nearly so intense as those who have not prepared themselves.So I encourage you to continue to give yourself to your spiritual practice.Follow your guidance.Trust in your guidance.Know that just as the light is intensifying, so will your guidance and so will your support be intensifying.You are learning to dine on this light.You are learning to live on that.You are learning to be dependent upon that light, upon that Creator, rather than upon limited realities that are ever crumbling around you.So this is your sanctuary.This is your joy, your love and peace.It is within you."Sananda, through Eric KleinThe Inner Door: Channeled Discourses from the Ascended Masters on Self-Mastery and AscensionVolume One
_source.contentraw:
"Most in the world, most on this planetary sphere, are in a position of resisting growth. There are very few who are welcoming it. And there is a great need for those who can do this and can share this experience with others. You are those.

You are the group, you are members of the group that exists throughout the globe at this time, the Light Workers. And because you are more sensitive, you are experiencing these energies and these changes a bit ahead of others who are not quite so sensitive.

This will benefit you in the long run. You are coming into the clear, so to speak. Your changes will not be nearly so intense as those who have not prepared themselves.

So I encourage you to continue to give yourself to your spiritual practice.
Follow your guidance.
Trust in your guidance.
Know that just as the light is intensifying, so will your guidance and so will your support be intensifying.
You are learning to dine on this light.
You are learning to live on that.
You are learning to be dependent upon that light, upon that Creator, rather than upon limited realities that are ever crumbling around you.
So this is your sanctuary.
This is your joy, your love and peace.
It is within you."

Sananda, through Eric Klein
The Inner Door: Channeled Discourses from the Ascended Masters on Self-Mastery and Ascension
Volume One

@ConstitutionParty @ConstitutionPartyServices @ConstitutionPartyLA @ConstitutionPartyofLouisiana @CPofLouisiana @CPofCC1776 @VoterGA History1992: A coalition of independent state parties united to form the U.S. Taxpayers Party. The partyâ€™s founder, Howard Phillips, was on the ballot in 21 states as its first presidential candidate.1995: Party recognized by Federal Election Commission as a national party bringing the number of nationally recognized parties to 5.1999: Name changed to â€œConstitution Partyâ€ by delegates at the National Convention to better reflect the partyâ€™s primary focus of returning government to the U.S. Constitutionâ€™s provisions and limitations. A BRIEF ELECTION HISTORY1992: A coalition of independent state parties united to form the U.S. Taxpayers Party at its first national convention in New Orleans, Louisiana.  Among the notable convention speakers was former Congressman Ron Paul. The partyâ€™s founder, Howard Phillips of Virginia, Chairman of the grass-roots lobby, the Conservative Caucus, was nominated to be the partyâ€™s first candidate for President with retired Army Brigadier General Albion Knight of Maryland nominated as the partyâ€™s first vice-presidential running mate. The US Taxpayerâ€™s Party secured ballot position in 21 states.1996: Howard Phillips was again nominated to be the partyâ€™s presidential candidate for the 1996 campaign at the partyâ€™s national convention held in San Diego, California.  Attorney and writer Herb Titus of Oregon was the Constitution Partyâ€™s Vice President nominee. Ballot access was achieved in 39 states for the 1996 elections, representing over 80% of the Electoral College votes available.2000: Delegates attending the National Convention in September 1999 voted to change the name of the US Taxpayerâ€™s Party to â€œConstitution Partyâ€ to better reflect the partyâ€™s primary focus of returning government to the U.S. Constitutionâ€™s provisions and limitations.  For a third and last time, Howard Phillips was nominated to serve as the standard bearer for the newly named Constitution Party for the 2000 election. Missouri surgeon Dr. J. Curtis Frazier was the nominee for Vice President. The convention was held in St. Louis, Missouri.2004: The Constitution Party achieved ballot access in 41 states and, at its convention in Valley Forge, Pennsylvania, it nominated Maryland lawyer Michael Peroutka, founder of the Institute on the Constitution, as its presidential nominee with Florida minister and commentator Chuck Baldwin as its nominee for Vice-President. Although the Constitution Party was on fewer state ballots in 2004, the vote tally increased by 40 percent compared to the 2000 elections while other â€˜alternativeâ€™ parties lost ground or barely matched their 2000 vote totals.2008: At its Kansas City, Missouri national convention, the Constitution Party nominated its 2004 nominee for Vice President, Chuck Baldwin of Florida, to be its 2008 nominee for President, selecting attorney and Constitution Party activist Darrell Castle of Tennessee, to serve as the Vice-presidential nominee.2012: Former six-term Virginia Congressman, Virgil Goode, was nominated for President at the Constitution Party National Convention held in Nashville, Tennessee. Three-term Constitution Party National Chairman, attorney Jim Clymer of Pennsylvania, was nominated to serve as Goodeâ€™s running mate.2016: Founding Constitution Party member, three term Vice-chairman of the National Committee of the Constitution Party, and 2008 Constitution Party Vice-presidential Candidate Darrell Castle was nominated for President. Mr. Castleâ€™s running mate was Dr. Scott Bradley of Utah who holds a PhD in Constitutional Law. The campaign garnered over 200,000 votes setting a Constitution Party record.

#BrianBerletic's #Newatlas Channel: âš”ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ NEW VIDEO: "Avdeevka Encirclement + US Prepares Ukraine for "Last Chance" Offensive, Surging Ammunition"
"Update on Russian military operations for March 20, 2023:
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian forces are not only encircling the fortified city of #Bakhmut, but now also apparently #Avdiivka;
â–ªï¸ Both cities are heavily fortified positions along ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraineâ€™s main defense line in the #Donbass region & their encirclement will compromise the entire defense line;
â–ªï¸ Western media continues admitting critical shortages of Ukrainian manpower, weapons & ammunition;
â–ªï¸ As ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraine is preparing for its 'spring offensive', the ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ US & its ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆ allies are likely utilizing emergency stockpiles to surge the amount of artillery & rocket ammunition to Ukraine in amounts much higher than have recently been transferred;
â–ªï¸ This surge is a one-time possibility after which ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· Western stockpiles will be exhausted & future shipments will depend mainly on monthly ammunition production which and will be for several years unable to match or exceed Russian ammunition supplies;
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraine is being forced to organize a massive offensive using poorly trained troops operating equipment they are unfamiliar with against ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian forces who have been preparing to meet this offensive months in advance;
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukrainian forces could once again compel Russian forces into withdrawals but will suffer immense losses before facing counteroffensives comprised of 350k ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian reservists.

References:
* New York Times - Ukraine Burns Through Ammunition in Bakhmut, Putting Future Fights at Risk (March 16, 2023):
* The Kyiv Independent - Media: Public data suggests over 16,000 #RussianSoldiers have been killed during first year of all-out war (March 4, 2023):
* The Kyiv Independent - Battle of Bakhmut: Ukrainian soldiers worry Russians begin to â€˜taste victoryâ€™ (March 15, 2023):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Claims Control Avdeevka Roads, MSM Russia Tasting Victory Bakhmut, US Demands #Counterattack (March 17, 2023)."

Katy S.: "People who follow this channel, The Duran & also Scott Ritter & Col Douglas MacGregor closely know that Bakhmut as well as Avdiivka matters a lot to Ukraine. They will try everything to not lose it, however the Western ğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆ media claimed a lot it never mattered, but those fortifications there speak more than thousand words. It will be a media catastrophe when both cities are lost, so they will spin it like they never mattered. Thanks Brian Berletic for the constant & reliable updates! ğŸ‘"

This is welcome news. Thank you for the updates Brian."

#BrianBerletic's #Newatlas Channel: âš”ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ NEW VIDEO: "Avdeevka Encirclement + US Prepares Ukraine for "Last Chance" Offensive, Surging Ammunition"
"Update on Russian military operations for March 20, 2023:
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian forces are not only encircling the fortified city of #Bakhmut, but now also apparently #Avdiivka;
â–ªï¸ Both cities are heavily fortified positions along ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraineâ€™s main defense line in the #Donbass region & their encirclement will compromise the entire defense line;
â–ªï¸ Western media continues admitting critical shortages of Ukrainian manpower, weapons & ammunition;
â–ªï¸ As ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraine is preparing for its 'spring offensive', the ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ US & its ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆ allies are likely utilizing emergency stockpiles to surge the amount of artillery & rocket ammunition to Ukraine in amounts much higher than have recently been transferred;
â–ªï¸ This surge is a one-time possibility after which ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· Western stockpiles will be exhausted & future shipments will depend mainly on monthly ammunition production which and will be for several years unable to match or exceed Russian ammunition supplies;
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraine is being forced to organize a massive offensive using poorly trained troops operating equipment they are unfamiliar with against ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian forces who have been preparing to meet this offensive months in advance;
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukrainian forces could once again compel Russian forces into withdrawals but will suffer immense losses before facing counteroffensives comprised of 350k ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian reservists.

References:
* New York Times - Ukraine Burns Through Ammunition in Bakhmut, Putting Future Fights at Risk (March 16, 2023):
* The Kyiv Independent - Media: Public data suggests over 16,000 #RussianSoldiers have been killed during first year of all-out war (March 4, 2023):
* The Kyiv Independent - Battle of Bakhmut: Ukrainian soldiers worry Russians begin to â€˜taste victoryâ€™ (March 15, 2023):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Claims Control Avdeevka Roads, MSM Russia Tasting Victory Bakhmut, US Demands #Counterattack (March 17, 2023)."

"Avdeevka Encirclement + US Prepares Ukraine for "Last Chance" Offensive, Surging Ammunition" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wBNEKHkADD8 (25:47)


Katy S.: "People who follow this channel, The Duran & also Scott Ritter & Col Douglas MacGregor closely know that Bakhmut as well as Avdiivka matters a lot to Ukraine. They will try everything to not lose it, however the Western ğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆ media claimed a lot it never mattered, but those fortifications there speak more than thousand words. It will be a media catastrophe when both cities are lost, so they will spin it like they never mattered. Thanks Brian Berletic for the constant & reliable updates! ğŸ‘"

Rochelle Glickman: "Thank heavens for this news. I hope it will end the suffering of the people of Donetsk City." ğŸ™

Corbynite: "The liberation of Avdeevka will bring more relief to the people of DPR, at least in the short term, than the liberation of Bakhmut, precisely because it has been used by the ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦Banderites to shell civilian targets in Donetsk for so long. This is welcome news. Thank you for the updates Brian."

georgekostaras: "I remember like two weeks ago western media was saying that Bakhmut was strategically irrelevant. Now theyâ€™re saying itâ€™s life and death. Iâ€™m sure after it falls theyâ€™ll go back to saying it never mattered."

Eric Kemper: "Thank you for all the updates on the liberation of Ukraine/ #WestRussia!"

Terry Stevenson: "An outstanding update! Thank you, Brian. #Russia is not just holding out against NATO, Russia is winning. Russia has also defeated #NATO's economic strangulation, and time is up now for [their] imperial banking system & [their] crappy, financialized economies. But you're right, the western oligarchs are nuts & they are out of options, that means [they] are dangerous for the world."

Bobby Fresh: "Always happy to watch your presentation!"
Robert Olweny: "Thank you, Brian!!! Love your analysisâ€¦...â¤ï¸"

#BrianBerletic's #Newatlas Channel: âš”ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ NEW VIDEO: "Avdeevka Encirclement + US Prepares Ukraine for "Last Chance" Offensive, Surging Ammunition"
"Update on Russian military operations for March 20, 2023:
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian forces are not only encircling the fortified city of #Bakhmut, but now also apparently #Avdiivka;
â–ªï¸ Both cities are heavily fortified positions along ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraineâ€™s main defense line in the #Donbass region & their encirclement will compromise the entire defense line;
â–ªï¸ Western media continues admitting critical shortages of Ukrainian manpower, weapons & ammunition;
â–ªï¸ As ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraine is preparing for its 'spring offensive', the ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ US & its ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆ allies are likely utilizing emergency stockpiles to surge the amount of artillery & rocket ammunition to Ukraine in amounts much higher than have recently been transferred;
â–ªï¸ This surge is a one-time possibility after which ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· Western stockpiles will be exhausted & future shipments will depend mainly on monthly ammunition production which and will be for several years unable to match or exceed Russian ammunition supplies;
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraine is being forced to organize a massive offensive using poorly trained troops operating equipment they are unfamiliar with against ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian forces who have been preparing to meet this offensive months in advance;
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukrainian forces could once again compel Russian forces into withdrawals but will suffer immense losses before facing counteroffensives comprised of 350k ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian reservists.

References:
* New York Times - Ukraine Burns Through Ammunition in Bakhmut, Putting Future Fights at Risk (March 16, 2023):
* The Kyiv Independent - Media: Public data suggests over 16,000 #RussianSoldiers have been killed during first year of all-out war (March 4, 2023):
* The Kyiv Independent - Battle of Bakhmut: Ukrainian soldiers worry Russians begin to â€˜taste victoryâ€™ (March 15, 2023):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Claims Control Avdeevka Roads, MSM Russia Tasting Victory Bakhmut, US Demands #Counterattack (March 17, 2023)."

"Avdeevka Encirclement + US Prepares Ukraine for "Last Chance" Offensive, Surging Ammunition" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wBNEKHkADD8 (25:47)


Katy S.: "People who follow this channel, The Duran & also Scott Ritter & Col Douglas MacGregor closely know that Bakhmut as well as Avdiivka matters a lot to Ukraine. They will try everything to not lose it, however the Western ğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆ media claimed a lot it never mattered, but those fortifications there speak more than thousand words. It will be a media catastrophe when both cities are lost, so they will spin it like they never mattered. Thanks Brian Berletic for the constant & reliable updates! ğŸ‘"

Rochelle Glickman: "Thank heavens for this news. I hope it will end the suffering of the people of Donetsk City." ğŸ™

Corbynite: "The liberation of Avdeevka will bring more relief to the people of DPR, at least in the short term, than the liberation of Bakhmut, precisely because it has been used by the ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦Banderites to shell civilian targets in Donetsk for so long. This is welcome news. Thank you for the updates Brian."

georgekostaras: "I remember like two weeks ago western media was saying that Bakhmut was strategically irrelevant. Now theyâ€™re saying itâ€™s life and death. Iâ€™m sure after it falls theyâ€™ll go back to saying it never mattered."

Eric Kemper: "Thank you for all the updates on the liberation of Ukraine/ #WestRussia!"

Terry Stevenson: "An outstanding update! Thank you, Brian. #Russia is not just holding out against NATO, Russia is winning. Russia has also defeated #NATO's economic strangulation, and time is up now for [their] imperial banking system & [their] crappy, financialized economies. But you're right, the western oligarchs are nuts & they are out of options, that means [they] are dangerous for the world."

Bobby Fresh: "Always happy to watch your presentation!"
Robert Olweny: "Thank you, Brian!!! Love your analysisâ€¦...â¤ï¸"

#BrianBerletic's #Newatlas Channel: âš”ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ NEW VIDEO: "Avdeevka Encirclement + US Prepares Ukraine for "Last Chance" Offensive, Surging Ammunition"
"Update on Russian military operations for March 20, 2023:
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian forces are not only encircling the fortified city of #Bakhmut, but now also apparently #Avdiivka;
â–ªï¸ Both cities are heavily fortified positions along ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraineâ€™s main defense line in the #Donbass region & their encirclement will compromise the entire defense line;
â–ªï¸ Western media continues admitting critical shortages of Ukrainian manpower, weapons & ammunition;
â–ªï¸ As ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraine is preparing for its 'spring offensive', the ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ US & its ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆ allies are likely utilizing emergency stockpiles to surge the amount of artillery & rocket ammunition to Ukraine in amounts much higher than have recently been transferred;
â–ªï¸ This surge is a one-time possibility after which ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· Western stockpiles will be exhausted & future shipments will depend mainly on monthly ammunition production which and will be for several years unable to match or exceed Russian ammunition supplies;
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraine is being forced to organize a massive offensive using poorly trained troops operating equipment they are unfamiliar with against ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian forces who have been preparing to meet this offensive months in advance;
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukrainian forces could once again compel Russian forces into withdrawals but will suffer immense losses before facing counteroffensives comprised of 350k ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian reservists.

References:
* New York Times - Ukraine Burns Through Ammunition in Bakhmut, Putting Future Fights at Risk (March 16, 2023):
* The Kyiv Independent - Media: Public data suggests over 16,000 #RussianSoldiers have been killed during first year of all-out war (March 4, 2023):
* The Kyiv Independent - Battle of Bakhmut: Ukrainian soldiers worry Russians begin to â€˜taste victoryâ€™ (March 15, 2023):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Claims Control Avdeevka Roads, MSM Russia Tasting Victory Bakhmut, US Demands #Counterattack (March 17, 2023)."

"Avdeevka Encirclement + US Prepares Ukraine for "Last Chance" Offensive, Surging Ammunition" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wBNEKHkADD8 (25:47)


Katy S.: "People who follow this channel, The Duran & also Scott Ritter & Col Douglas MacGregor closely know that Bakhmut as well as Avdiivka matters a lot to Ukraine. They will try everything to not lose it, however the Western ğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆ media claimed a lot it never mattered, but those fortifications there speak more than thousand words. It will be a media catastrophe when both cities are lost, so they will spin it like they never mattered. Thanks Brian Berletic for the constant & reliable updates! ğŸ‘"

Rochelle Glickman: "Thank heavens for this news. I hope it will end the suffering of the people of Donetsk City." ğŸ™

Corbynite: "The liberation of Avdeevka will bring more relief to the people of DPR, at least in the short term, than the liberation of Bakhmut, precisely because it has been used by the ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦Banderites to shell civilian targets in Donetsk for so long. This is welcome news. Thank you for the updates Brian."

georgekostaras: "I remember like two weeks ago western media was saying that Bakhmut was strategically irrelevant. Now theyâ€™re saying itâ€™s life and death. Iâ€™m sure after it falls theyâ€™ll go back to saying it never mattered."

Eric Kemper: "Thank you for all the updates on the liberation of Ukraine/ #WestRussia!"

Terry Stevenson: "An outstanding update! Thank you, Brian. #Russia is not just holding out against NATO, Russia is winning. Russia has also defeated #NATO's economic strangulation, and time is up now for [their] imperial banking system & [their] crappy, financialized economies. But you're right, the western oligarchs are nuts & they are out of options, that means [they] are dangerous for the world."

#BrianBerletic's #Newatlas Channel: âš”ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ NEW VIDEO: "Avdeevka Encirclement + US Prepares Ukraine for "Last Chance" Offensive, Surging Ammunition"
"Update on Russian military operations for March 20, 2023:
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian forces are not only encircling the fortified city of #Bakhmut, but now also apparently #Avdiivka;
â–ªï¸ Both cities are heavily fortified positions along ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraineâ€™s main defense line in the #Donbass region & their encirclement will compromise the entire defense line;
â–ªï¸ Western media continues admitting critical shortages of Ukrainian manpower, weapons & ammunition;
â–ªï¸ As ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraine is preparing for its 'spring offensive', the ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ US & its ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆ allies are likely utilizing emergency stockpiles to surge the amount of artillery & rocket ammunition to Ukraine in amounts much higher than have recently been transferred;
â–ªï¸ This surge is a one-time possibility after which ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· Western stockpiles will be exhausted & future shipments will depend mainly on monthly ammunition production which and will be for several years unable to match or exceed Russian ammunition supplies;
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraine is being forced to organize a massive offensive using poorly trained troops operating equipment they are unfamiliar with against ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian forces who have been preparing to meet this offensive months in advance;
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukrainian forces could once again compel Russian forces into withdrawals but will suffer immense losses before facing counteroffensives comprised of 350k ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian reservists.

References:
* New York Times - Ukraine Burns Through Ammunition in Bakhmut, Putting Future Fights at Risk (March 16, 2023):
* The Kyiv Independent - Media: Public data suggests over 16,000 #RussianSoldiers have been killed during first year of all-out war (March 4, 2023):
* The Kyiv Independent - Battle of Bakhmut: Ukrainian soldiers worry Russians begin to â€˜taste victoryâ€™ (March 15, 2023):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Claims Control Avdeevka Roads, MSM Russia Tasting Victory Bakhmut, US Demands #Counterattack (March 17, 2023)."

"Avdeevka Encirclement + US Prepares Ukraine for "Last Chance" Offensive, Surging Ammunition" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wBNEKHkADD8 (25:47)


Katy S.: "People who follow this channel, The Duran & also Scott Ritter & Col Douglas MacGregor closely know that Bakhmut as well as Avdiivka matters a lot to Ukraine. They will try everything to not lose it, however the Western ğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆ media claimed a lot it never mattered, but those fortifications there speak more than thousand words. It will be a media catastrophe when both cities are lost, so they will spin it like they never mattered. Thanks Brian Berletic for the constant & reliable updates! ğŸ‘"

Rochelle Glickman: "Thank heavens for this news. I hope it will end the suffering of the people of Donetsk City." ğŸ™

Corbynite: "The liberation of Avdeevka will bring more relief to the people of DPR, at least in the short term, than the liberation of Bakhmut, precisely because it has been used by the ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦Banderites to shell civilian targets in Donetsk for so long. This is welcome news. Thank you for the updates Brian."

georgekostaras: "I remember like two weeks ago western media was saying that Bakhmut was strategically irrelevant. Now theyâ€™re saying itâ€™s life and death. Iâ€™m sure after it falls theyâ€™ll go back to saying it never mattered."

Eric Kemper: "Thank you for all the updates on the liberation of Ukraine/ #WestRussia!"

Terry Stevenson: "An outstanding update! Thank you, Brian. #Russia is not just holding out against NATO, Russia is winning. Russia has also defeated #NATO's economic strangulation, and time is up now for [their] imperial banking system & [their] crappy, financialized economies. But you're right, the western oligarchs are nuts & they are out of options, that means [they] are dangerous for the world."

Bobby Fresh: "Always happy to watch your presentation!"
Robert Olweny: "Thank you, Brian!!! Love your analysisâ€¦...â¤ï¸"

#BrianBerletic's #Newatlas Channel: âš”ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ NEW VIDEO: "Avdeevka Encirclement + US Prepares Ukraine for "Last Chance" Offensive, Surging Ammunition"
"Update on Russian military operations for March 20, 2023:
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian forces are not only encircling the fortified city of #Bakhmut, but now also apparently #Avdiivka;
â–ªï¸ Both cities are heavily fortified positions along ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraineâ€™s main defense line in the #Donbass region & their encirclement will compromise the entire defense line;
â–ªï¸ Western media continues admitting critical shortages of Ukrainian manpower, weapons & ammunition;
â–ªï¸ As ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraine is preparing for its 'spring offensive', the ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ US & its ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆ allies are likely utilizing emergency stockpiles to surge the amount of artillery & rocket ammunition to Ukraine in amounts much higher than have recently been transferred;
â–ªï¸ This surge is a one-time possibility after which ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· Western stockpiles will be exhausted & future shipments will depend mainly on monthly ammunition production which and will be for several years unable to match or exceed Russian ammunition supplies;
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraine is being forced to organize a massive offensive using poorly trained troops operating equipment they are unfamiliar with against ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian forces who have been preparing to meet this offensive months in advance;
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukrainian forces could once again compel Russian forces into withdrawals but will suffer immense losses before facing counteroffensives comprised of 350k ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian reservists.

References:
* New York Times - Ukraine Burns Through Ammunition in Bakhmut, Putting Future Fights at Risk (March 16, 2023):
* The Kyiv Independent - Media: Public data suggests over 16,000 #RussianSoldiers have been killed during first year of all-out war (March 4, 2023):
* The Kyiv Independent - Battle of Bakhmut: Ukrainian soldiers worry Russians begin to â€˜taste victoryâ€™ (March 15, 2023):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Claims Control Avdeevka Roads, MSM Russia Tasting Victory Bakhmut, US Demands #Counterattack (March 17, 2023)."

"Avdeevka Encirclement + US Prepares Ukraine for "Last Chance" Offensive, Surging Ammunition" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wBNEKHkADD8 (25:47)


Katy S.: "People who follow this channel, The Duran & also Scott Ritter & Col Douglas MacGregor closely know that Bakhmut as well as Avdiivka matters a lot to Ukraine. They will try everything to not lose it, however the Western ğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆ media claimed a lot it never mattered, but those fortifications there speak more than thousand words. It will be a media catastrophe when both cities are lost, so they will spin it like they never mattered. Thanks Brian Berletic for the constant & reliable updates! ğŸ‘"

Rochelle Glickman: "Thank heavens for this news. I hope it will end the suffering of the people of Donetsk City." ğŸ™

Corbynite: "The liberation of Avdeevka will bring more relief to the people of DPR, at least in the short term, than the liberation of Bakhmut, precisely because it has been used by the ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦Banderites to shell civilian targets in Donetsk for so long. This is welcome news. Thank you for the updates Brian."

georgekostaras: "I remember like two weeks ago western media was saying that Bakhmut was strategically irrelevant. Now theyâ€™re saying itâ€™s life and death. Iâ€™m sure after it falls theyâ€™ll go back to saying it never mattered."

Eric Kemper: "Thank you for all the updates on the liberation of Ukraine/ #WestRussia!"

Terry Stevenson: "An outstanding update! Thank you, Brian. #Russia is not just holding out against NATO, Russia is winning. Russia has also defeated #NATO's economic strangulation, and time is up now for [their] imperial banking system & [their] crappy, financialized economies. But you're right, the western oligarchs are nuts & they are out of options, that means [they] are dangerous for the world."

Bobby Fresh: "Always happy to watch your presentation!"
Robert Olweny: "Thank you, Brian!!! Love your analysisâ€¦...â¤ï¸"

#BrianBerletic's #Newatlas Channel: âš”ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ NEW VIDEO: "Avdeevka Encirclement + US Prepares Ukraine for "Last Chance" Offensive, Surging Ammunition"
"Update on Russian military operations for March 20, 2023:
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian forces are not only encircling the fortified city of #Bakhmut, but now also apparently #Avdiivka;
â–ªï¸ Both cities are heavily fortified positions along ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraineâ€™s main defense line in the #Donbass region & their encirclement will compromise the entire defense line;
â–ªï¸ Western media continues admitting critical shortages of Ukrainian manpower, weapons & ammunition;
â–ªï¸ As ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraine is preparing for its 'spring offensive', the ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ US & its ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆ allies are likely utilizing emergency stockpiles to surge the amount of artillery & rocket ammunition to Ukraine in amounts much higher than have recently been transferred;
â–ªï¸ This surge is a one-time possibility after which ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· Western stockpiles will be exhausted & future shipments will depend mainly on monthly ammunition production which and will be for several years unable to match or exceed Russian ammunition supplies;
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraine is being forced to organize a massive offensive using poorly trained troops operating equipment they are unfamiliar with against ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian forces who have been preparing to meet this offensive months in advance;
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukrainian forces could once again compel Russian forces into withdrawals but will suffer immense losses before facing counteroffensives comprised of 350k ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian reservists.

References:
* New York Times - Ukraine Burns Through Ammunition in Bakhmut, Putting Future Fights at Risk (March 16, 2023):
* The Kyiv Independent - Media: Public data suggests over 16,000 #RussianSoldiers have been killed during first year of all-out war (March 4, 2023):
* The Kyiv Independent - Battle of Bakhmut: Ukrainian soldiers worry Russians begin to â€˜taste victoryâ€™ (March 15, 2023):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Claims Control Avdeevka Roads, MSM Russia Tasting Victory Bakhmut, US Demands #Counterattack (March 17, 2023)."

"Avdeevka Encirclement + US Prepares Ukraine for "Last Chance" Offensive, Surging Ammunition" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wBNEKHkADD8 (25:47)


Katy S.: "People who follow this channel, The Duran & also Scott Ritter & Col Douglas MacGregor closely know that Bakhmut as well as Avdiivka matters a lot to Ukraine. They will try everything to not lose it, however the Western ğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆ media claimed a lot it never mattered, but those fortifications there speak more than thousand words. It will be a media catastrophe when both cities are lost, so they will spin it like they never mattered. Thanks Brian Berletic for the constant & reliable updates! ğŸ‘"

Rochelle Glickman: "Thank heavens for this news. I hope it will end the suffering of the people of Donetsk City." ğŸ™

Corbynite: "The liberation of Avdeevka will bring more relief to the people of DPR, at least in the short term, than the liberation of Bakhmut, precisely because it has been used by the ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦Banderites to shell civilian targets in Donetsk for so long. This is welcome news. Thank you for the updates Brian."

georgekostaras: "I remember like two weeks ago western media was saying that Bakhmut was strategically irrelevant. Now theyâ€™re saying itâ€™s life and death. Iâ€™m sure after it falls theyâ€™ll go back to saying it never mattered."

Eric Kemper: "Thank you for all the updates on the liberation of Ukraine/ #WestRussia!"

Terry Stevenson: "An outstanding update! Thank you, Brian. #Russia is not just holding out against NATO, Russia is winning. Russia has also defeated #NATO's economic strangulation, and time is up now for [their] imperial banking system & [their] crappy, financialized economies. But you're right, the western oligarchs are nuts & they are out of options, that means [they] are dangerous for the world."

Bobby Fresh: "Always happy to watch your presentation!"
Robert Olweny: "Thank you, Brian!!! Love your analysisâ€¦...â¤ï¸"

BrianBerletic's Newatlas Channel: âš”ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ NEW VIDEO: "Avdeevka Encirclement + US Prepares Ukraine for "Last Chance" Offensive, Surging Ammunition"
"Update on Russian military operations for March 20, 2023:
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian forces are not only encircling the fortified city of Bakhmut, but now also apparently Avdiivka;
â–ªï¸ Both cities are heavily fortified positions along ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraineâ€™s main defense line in the Donbass region & their encirclement will compromise the entire defense line;
â–ªï¸ Western media continues admitting critical shortages of Ukrainian manpower, weapons & ammunition;
â–ªï¸ As ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraine is preparing for its 'spring offensive', the ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ US & its ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆ allies are likely utilizing emergency stockpiles to surge the amount of artillery & rocket ammunition to Ukraine in amounts much higher than have recently been transferred;
â–ªï¸ This surge is a one-time possibility after which ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· Western stockpiles will be exhausted & future shipments will depend mainly on monthly ammunition production which and will be for several years unable to match or exceed Russian ammunition supplies;
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraine is being forced to organize a massive offensive using poorly trained troops operating equipment they are unfamiliar with against ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian forces who have been preparing to meet this offensive months in advance;
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukrainian forces could once again compel Russian forces into withdrawals but will suffer immense losses before facing counteroffensives comprised of 350k ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian reservists.

References:
* New York Times - Ukraine Burns Through Ammunition in Bakhmut, Putting Future Fights at Risk (March 16, 2023):
* The Kyiv Independent - Media: Public data suggests over 16,000 Russian Soldiers have been killed during first year of all-out war (March 4, 2023):
* The Kyiv Independent - Battle of Bakhmut: Ukrainian soldiers worry Russians begin to â€˜taste victoryâ€™ (March 15, 2023):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Claims Control Avdeevka Roads, MSM Russia Tasting Victory Bakhmut, US Demands Counterattack (March 17, 2023)."

"Avdeevka Encirclement + US Prepares Ukraine for "Last Chance" Offensive, Surging Ammunition" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wBNEKHkADD8 (25:47)

Katy S.: "People who follow this channel, The Duran & also Scott Ritter & Col Douglas MacGregor closely know that Bakhmut as well as Avdiivka matters a lot to Ukraine. They will try everything to not lose it, however the Western ğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆ media claimed a lot it never mattered, but those fortifications there speak more than thousand words. It will be a media catastrophe when both cities are lost, so they will spin it like they never mattered. Thanks Brian Berletic for the constant & reliable updates! ğŸ‘"

Rochelle Glickman: "Thank heavens for this news. I hope it will end the suffering of the people of Donetsk City." ğŸ™

Corbynite: "The liberation of Avdeevka will bring more relief to the people of DPR, at least in the short term, than the liberation of Bakhmut, precisely because it has been used by the ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦Banderites to shell civilian targets in Donetsk for so long. This is welcome news. Thank you for the updates Brian."

georgekostaras: "I remember like two weeks ago western media was saying that Bakhmut was strategically irrelevant. Now theyâ€™re saying itâ€™s life and death. Iâ€™m sure after it falls theyâ€™ll go back to saying it never mattered."

Eric Kemper: "Thank you for all the updates on the liberation of Ukraine/ WestRussia!"

Terry Stevenson: "An outstanding update! Thank you, Brian. Russia is not just holding out against NATO, Russia is winning. Russia has also defeated NATO's economic strangulation, and time is up now for [their] imperial banking system & [their] crappy, financialized economies. But you're right, the western oligarchs are nuts & they are out of options, that means [they] are dangerous for the world."

Bobby Fresh: "Always happy to watch your presentation!"
Robert Olweny: "Thank you, Brian!!! Love your analysisâ€¦...â¤ï¸"

group.description: Seit im Mai 1832 zum ersten Mal die schwarz-rot-goldene Fahne auf dem Kastanienberg bei Neustadt wehte, gilt das Hambacher Schloss als Wiege der deutschen Demokratie. Am Hambacher Fest 1832 nahmen 30.000 Menschen teil, um dort ihre Forderungen nach Einheit und Freiheit auszurufen.

Am Hambacher Fest 1832 nahmen 30.000 Menschen teil, um dort ihre Forderungen nach Einheit und Freiheit auszurufen.

#BrianBerletic's #Newatlas Channel: âš”ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ NEW VIDEO: "Avdeevka Encirclement + US Prepares Ukraine for "Last Chance" Offensive, Surging Ammunition"
"Update on Russian military operations for March 20, 2023:
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian forces are not only encircling the fortified city of #Bakhmut, but now also apparently #Avdiivka;
â–ªï¸ Both cities are heavily fortified positions along ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraineâ€™s main defense line in the #Donbass region & their encirclement will compromise the entire defense line;
â–ªï¸ Western media continues admitting critical shortages of Ukrainian manpower, weapons & ammunition;
â–ªï¸ As ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraine is preparing for its 'spring offensive', the ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ US & its ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆ allies are likely utilizing emergency stockpiles to surge the amount of artillery & rocket ammunition to Ukraine in amounts much higher than have recently been transferred;
â–ªï¸ This surge is a one-time possibility after which ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· Western stockpiles will be exhausted & future shipments will depend mainly on monthly ammunition production which and will be for several years unable to match or exceed Russian ammunition supplies;
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraine is being forced to organize a massive offensive using poorly trained troops operating equipment they are unfamiliar with against ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian forces who have been preparing to meet this offensive months in advance;
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukrainian forces could once again compel Russian forces into withdrawals but will suffer immense losses before facing counteroffensives comprised of 350k ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian reservists.

References:
* New York Times - Ukraine Burns Through Ammunition in Bakhmut, Putting Future Fights at Risk (March 16, 2023):
* The Kyiv Independent - Media: Public data suggests over 16,000 #RussianSoldiers have been killed during first year of all-out war (March 4, 2023):
* The Kyiv Independent - Battle of Bakhmut: Ukrainian soldiers worry Russians begin to â€˜taste victoryâ€™ (March 15, 2023):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Claims Control Avdeevka Roads, MSM Russia Tasting Victory Bakhmut, US Demands #Counterattack (March 17, 2023)."

"Avdeevka Encirclement + US Prepares Ukraine for "Last Chance" Offensive, Surging Ammunition" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wBNEKHkADD8 (25:47)


Katy S.: "People who follow this channel, The Duran & also Scott Ritter & Col Douglas MacGregor closely know that Bakhmut as well as Avdiivka matters a lot to Ukraine. They will try everything to not lose it, however the Western ğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆ media claimed a lot it never mattered, but those fortifications there speak more than thousand words. It will be a media catastrophe when both cities are lost, so they will spin it like they never mattered. Thanks Brian Berletic for the constant & reliable updates! ğŸ‘"

Rochelle Glickman: "Thank heavens for this news. I hope it will end the suffering of the people of Donetsk City." ğŸ™

Corbynite: "The liberation of Avdeevka will bring more relief to the people of DPR, at least in the short term, than the liberation of Bakhmut, precisely because it has been used by the ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦Banderites to shell civilian targets in Donetsk for so long. This is welcome news. Thank you for the updates Brian."

georgekostaras: "I remember like two weeks ago western media was saying that Bakhmut was strategically irrelevant. Now theyâ€™re saying itâ€™s life and death. Iâ€™m sure after it falls theyâ€™ll go back to saying it never mattered."

Eric Kemper: "Thank you for all the updates on the liberation of Ukraine/ #WestRussia!"

Terry Stevenson: "An outstanding update! Thank you, Brian. #Russia is not just holding out against NATO, Russia is winning. Russia has also defeated #NATO's economic strangulation, and time is up now for [their] imperial banking system & [their] crappy, financialized economies. But you're right, the western oligarchs are nuts & they are out of options, that means [they] are dangerous for the world."

#BrianBerletic's #Newatlas Channel: âš”ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ NEW VIDEO: "Avdeevka Encirclement + US Prepares Ukraine for "Last Chance" Offensive, Surging Ammunition"
"Update on Russian military operations for March 20, 2023:
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian forces are not only encircling the fortified city of #Bakhmut, but now also apparently #Avdiivka;
â–ªï¸ Both cities are heavily fortified positions along ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraineâ€™s main defense line in the #Donbass region & their encirclement will compromise the entire defense line;
â–ªï¸ Western media continues admitting critical shortages of Ukrainian manpower, weapons & ammunition;
â–ªï¸ As ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraine is preparing for its 'spring offensive', the ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ US & its ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆ allies are likely utilizing emergency stockpiles to surge the amount of artillery & rocket ammunition to Ukraine in amounts much higher than have recently been transferred;
â–ªï¸ This surge is a one-time possibility after which ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· Western stockpiles will be exhausted & future shipments will depend mainly on monthly ammunition production which and will be for several years unable to match or exceed Russian ammunition supplies;
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukraine is being forced to organize a massive offensive using poorly trained troops operating equipment they are unfamiliar with against ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian forces who have been preparing to meet this offensive months in advance;
â–ªï¸ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukrainian forces could once again compel Russian forces into withdrawals but will suffer immense losses before facing counteroffensives comprised of 350k ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Russian reservists.

References:
* New York Times - Ukraine Burns Through Ammunition in Bakhmut, Putting Future Fights at Risk (March 16, 2023):
* The Kyiv Independent - Media: Public data suggests over 16,000 #RussianSoldiers have been killed during first year of all-out war (March 4, 2023):
* The Kyiv Independent - Battle of Bakhmut: Ukrainian soldiers worry Russians begin to â€˜taste victoryâ€™ (March 15, 2023):
* Alexander Mercouris - Russia Claims Control Avdeevka Roads, MSM Russia Tasting Victory Bakhmut, US Demands #Counterattack (March 17, 2023)."

Katy S.: "People who follow this channel, The Duran & also Scott Ritter & Col Douglas MacGregor closely know that Bakhmut as well as Avdiivka matters a lot to Ukraine. They will try everything to not lose it, however the Western ğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆ media claimed a lot it never mattered, but those fortifications there speak more than thousand words. It will be a media catastrophe when both cities are lost, so they will spin it like they never mattered. Thanks Brian Berletic for the constant & reliable updates! ğŸ‘"

This is welcome news. Thank you for the updates Brian."

georgekostaras: "I remember like two weeks ago western media was saying that Bakhmut was strategically irrelevant. Now theyâ€™re saying itâ€™s life and death. Iâ€™m sure after it falls theyâ€™ll go back to saying it never mattered."

Eric Kemper: "Thank you for all the updates on the liberation of Ukraine/ #WestRussia!"

Terry Stevenson: "An outstanding update! Thank you, Brian. #Russia is not just holding out against NATO, Russia is winning. Russia has also defeated #NATO's economic strangulation, and time is up now for [their] imperial banking system & [their] crappy, financialized economies. But you're right, the western oligarchs are nuts & they are out of options, that means [they] are dangerous for the world."

group.description: A group of MAGA patriots, largely former Treepers from CTH, who are followers of QAnon, and diehard supporters of President Donald Trump.  We support free speech, freedom of religion, the Constitution, and the principles handed down to us by the Founders.  We actively oppose all forms of censorship, and research all theories with open minds.  Our new site, theqtree.com, is where we hang out.  This Gab group is for when we need to "meet by the old mill".
